OrgName.entry: ST VINCENT DE PAUL SOCIETY - RECYCLING

AltName.entry: ST VINCENT DE PAUL FURNITURE STORE

Desc.entry: Collects clean, good quality, unwanted furniture and delivers free of charge to disadvantaged people. Clients need referral letter from statutory/voluntary agencies. No longer has a drop-in for clients visiting the store. Will not accept three piece suites without required fire-retardant label. Will collect, but a donation is requested. Company limited by guarantee no 3174679.
